holidays.title: Find Your Inner Nerd Day
holidays.description: Share your uniqueness and your favorite nerdy things with the world today.

holidays.title: Health Unit Coordinators Day
holidays.description: Without them, hospitals would be unable to navigate even the most basic health care tasks.

holidays.title: National Sponge Cake Day
holidays.description: This decadent dessert was first created by an Italian pastry chef for a Spanish lord.

holidays.title: Cheap Flight Day
holidays.description: Hopefully, you globetrotters marked your calendars for Cheap Flight Day, well in advance.

holidays.title: Day for Remembrance of the Slave Trade and Its Abolition
holidays.description: Keep memories alive so the world never makes the same mistakes again.

holidays.title: Day of the National Flag
holidays.description: Let's honor the flag, and what we stand for as a Nation  — freedom, equality, and hope!

holidays.title: European Day of Remembrance for Victims of Stalinism and Nazism
holidays.description: Wear a black ribbon today to commemorate the European Day of Remembrance for Victims of Stalinism and Nazism.

holidays.title: International Blind Dog Day
holidays.description: Read on to learn more about our blind furry friends this International Blind Dog Day.

holidays.title: International Day for the Remembrance of the Slave Trade and its Abolition
holidays.description: Join us and this movement against the slave trade to make the world a better place.

holidays.title: National Cuban Sandwich Day
holidays.description: The sandwich is mostly characterized by its delectable blend of ham, cheese, pork, and mustard.

holidays.title: National Levi Day
holidays.description: The name Levi has become a favorite amongst new parents for being both traditional and trendy.

holidays.title: National Ride The Wind Day
holidays.description: Take flight, relax, and enjoy the late summer breeze. It's time to ride the wind.

holidays.title: National Valentino Day
holidays.description: If your taste is classic vintage, let the Sheik show you how it's done.

holidays.title: Slavery Remembrance Day
holidays.description: The transatlantic slave trade is a blight on our history, but it must not be forgotten.

holidays.title: Badda TD’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dubbed the Prince of Flatbush, Badda TD is young, hungry, and one to watch.

holidays.title: Francesca Reale’s Birthday
holidays.description: Francesca Reale is just getting started and the sky is the limit for this actress.

holidays.title: James Tucker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Tucker’s sense of humor and self-possession make him one of the most interesting kids on YouTube.

holidays.title: Jennelle Eliana’s Birthday
holidays.description: Eliana put Gen-Z, female, black vanlifers on the map with her off-script, quirky travels.

holidays.title: Kobe Bryant’s Birthday
holidays.description: The legendary player, the late Kobe Bryant, was one of the highest-paid basketball players in history.

holidays.title: Rick Springfield’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rick Springfield is considered a multi-talented singer and acting legend, and we aren’t surprised!

holidays.title: River Phoenix’s Birthday
holidays.description: Phoenix was an exceptional talent in Hollywood whose life and bright career were tragically cut short.

holidays.title: Trixie Mattel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mattel is loved for her exaggerated style that combines fun, comedy, and acoustic pop.

holidays.title: William Ernest Henley’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a writer, editor, and critic, Henley embodied the Victorian era in word and thought.
